param.name: Language
param.comment: Set the tag-language to use from strings.xml

param.name: Gallery width
param.comment: Adjusts the main gallery width

param.name: Gallery height
param.comment: Adjusts the main gallery height

param.name: Gallery Background
param.comment: Adjusts the main gallery background

param.name: Gallery Background Image
param.comment: Sets the main gallery background image. You can upload images using the Upload BG button. Just remember to refresh the page.

param.name: Main Panel Y
param.comment: Adjusts the vertical position (in pixels) of the main panel. Enter an interger.

param.name: Main Panel Tooltip Text Position
param.comment: Enter above|below

param.name: Main Panel Height
param.comment: Adjusts the height of the main panel. Enter an interger

param.name: Main Panel Previous Image Button X
param.comment: Adjusts the horizontal position (in pixels) of the previous image button within the main panel. Enter an interger.

param.name: Main Panel Next Image Button X
param.comment: Adjusts the horizontal position (in pixels) of the next image button within the main panel. Enter an interger.

param.name: Main Panel Slide Show Button X
param.comment: Adjusts the horizontal position (in pixels) of the slideshow button within the main panel. Enter an interger.

param.name: Main Panel Audio Comment Button X
param.comment: Adjusts the horizontal position (in pixels) of the audio comment button within the main panel. Enter an interger.

param.name: Main Panel Image Description Button X
param.comment: Adjusts the horizontal position (in pixels) of the image description button within the main panel. Enter an interger.

param.name: Main Panel Select Album Button X
param.comment: Adjusts the horizontal position (in pixels) of the select album button within the main panel. Enter an interger.

param.name: Main Panel Image Strip Button X
param.comment: Adjusts the horizontal position (in pixels) of the show image strip button within the main panel. Enter an interger.

param.name: Main Panel Image Counter X
param.comment: Adjusts the horizontal position (in pixels) of the image counter within the main panel. Enter an interger.

param.name: Main Panel Image Counter Y
param.comment: Adjusts the vertical position (in pixels) of the image counter within the main panel. Enter an interger.

param.name: Main Panel Album Info X
param.comment: Adjusts the horizontal position (in pixels) of the album info within the main panel. Enter an interger.

param.name: Main Panel Album Info Y
param.comment: Adjusts the horizontal position (in pixels) of the album info within the main panel. Enter an interger.

param.name: Main Panel Help Button X
param.comment: Adjusts the horizontal position (in pixels) of the help button within the main panel. Enter an interger.

param.name: Image X
param.comment: Adjusts the horizontal position (in pixels) of the image. Enter an interger.

param.name: Image Y
param.comment: Adjusts the vertical position (in pixels) of the image. Enter an interger.

param.name: Image Strip Scrollbar Y
param.comment: Adjusts the vertical position (in pixels) of the image strip scrollbar. Enter an interger.

param.name: Image Strip Y
param.comment: Adjusts the vertical position (in pixels) of the image strip. Enter an interger.

param.name: Image Strip Height
param.comment: Adjusts the height (in pixels) of the image strip. Enter an interger.

param.name: Image Strip Min Scale
param.comment: Adjust the minimum scale (as a percentage) of image thumbnails when displayed in the image strip. Enter an interger.

param.name: Image Strip Min Alpha
param.comment: When an image in the image strip is in focus (i.e. moused-over), the alpha levels of the other images is reduced by this percentage. Enter an interger.

param.name: Image Strip Scroll Color
param.comment: The strip scroll are areas on the left and right of the image strip that indicate the scroll direction. This parameter controls the default color. Enter a color (in hex format).

param.name: Image Strip Scroll Rollover Color
param.comment: Adjusts the color of the strip scroll when in focus (i.e. moused-over). Enter a color (in hex format).

param.name: Image Strip Image Info Y
param.comment: Adjusts the vertical position (in pixels) of the image info when a thumbnail is in focus (i.e. moused-over). Enter an interger.

param.name: Image Strip Image Info Vertical Separation
param.comment: Adjusts the vertical separation between the image name and image date/location . Enter an interger.

param.name: Image Strip Image Description Y
param.comment: Adjusts the vertical position (in pixels) of the image description when a thumbnail is in focus (i.e. moused-over). Enter an interger.

param.name: Image Strip Image Description Width
param.comment: Adjust the width (in pixels) of the image description when a thumbnail is in focus (i.e. moused-over). Enter an interger.

param.name: Image Strip Image Description Color
param.comment: Adjusts the color of the image description area when a thumbnail is in focus (i.e. moused-over). Enter a color (in hex format).

param.name: Image Strip Image Description Alpha
param.comment: Adjusts the alpha level of the image description area when a thumbnail is in focus (i.e. moused-over). Enter an interger.

param.name: Image Strip Image Mask Curvature
param.comment: Adjusts the curvature of the image thumbnails. Enter an interger.

param.name: Image Strip Image Shadow Enabled
param.comment: Toggles shadowing of the image thumbnails. Options: yes|no

param.name: Image Strip Image Shadow Size
param.comment: Adjusts the size of the thumnail shadow (in pixels). Enter an interger.

param.name: Image Strip Image Shadow Delta
param.comment: Comment. Enter an interger.

param.name: Image Strip Image Shadow Delta X
param.comment: Adjusts the horizontal displacement (in pixels) of the thumbnail shadow. Enter an interger.

param.name: Image Strip Image Shadow Delta Y
param.comment: Adjusts the vertical displacement (in pixels) of the thumbnail shadow. Enter an interger.

param.name: Image Strip Image Shadow Alpha
param.comment: Adjusts the alpha levels (as a percentage) of the shadow. Enter an interger.

param.name: Image Strip Image Bevel Curvature
param.comment: Adjusts the curvature of the bevel corners. Enter an interger.

param.name: Image Strip Image Bevel Width
param.comment: Adjusts the width of the bevel padding. Enter an interger.

param.name: Image Strip Image Bevel Outline Thickness
param.comment: Adjusts the thickness (in pixels) of the bevel border. Options: option1|option2|option3

param.name: Image Strip Image Bevel Outline Color
param.comment: Adjusts the color of the bevel border. Enter a color (in hex format).

param.name: Image Strip Image Bevel Outline Color Alpha
param.comment: Adjusts the alpha level (as a percentage) of the bevel border. Enter an interger.

param.name: Image Strip Image Bevel Color
param.comment: Comment. Enter a color (in hex format).

param.name: Image Strip Image Bevel Color Alpha
param.comment: Comment. Enter a color (in hex format).

param.name: Image Strip Max Visible Images
param.comment: Enter integer

param.name: Image Strip Gradient Enabled
param.comment: Enable image strip gradient images. (NO if you change the background color.) Enter yes|no

param.name: Image Info Rowed Text Horizontal Alignment
Slide Show Time
param.comment: Slide show time in seconds

param.name: Slide Show Loop
param.comment: Loop the slide show Enter yes|no

param.name: Help Guide Enabled
param.comment: Enable the help guide. Enter yes|no

param.name: Help Guide Y
param.Comment: Vertical alignment of the help gudie. Enter integer

param.name: Album List Column Scroll Rollover Color
Album List Item Thumb Mask Curvature
Album List Item Thumb Bevel Curvature
Album List Item Thumb Bevel Width
Album List Item Thumb Bevel Outline Thickness
Album List Item Thumb Bevel Outline Color
Album List Item Thumb Bevel Outline Color Alpha
Album List Item Thumb Bevel Color
Album List Item Thumb Bevel Color Alpha
SpeedSense Enabled
param.comment: Enable speedsence. Enter yes|no
